title: go.tools/ssa: some traceback functions have in debugger ssa-interpreter versn
body:
by **rocky.bernstein**: 
I've added some of the traceback stack routines for the ssa-interpreter in the
debugger-enabled version of that interpreter. 

These routines are in: 
  https://github.com/rocky/ssa-interp/blob/master/interp/external4gub.go

Also, with this I've started using this in the interpreter implementation of panic. See
https://github.com/rocky/ssa-interp/blob/master/interp/interp.go#L158-L165
